title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Develop and deploy machine learning models for recommendation systems and predictive analytics.

title: Data Analyst
description: Analyze financial data, create dashboards, and generate insights to support business decisions.

title: AI Research Intern
description: Assist in fine-tuning large language models and research on generative AI applications.

title: Data Scientist
description: Work on healthcare data to build predictive models for patient outcomes and treatment optimization.

title: GenAI Engineer
description: Design and implement generative AI pipelines including text-to-image and conversational AI systems.

title: Business Intelligence Analyst
description: Develop BI solutions, automate reporting, and provide insights for strategic planning.

title: NLP Engineer
description: Build natural language processing pipelines for chatbots, sentiment analysis, and document summarization.

title: Junior Data Analyst
description: Perform exploratory data analysis and support senior analysts in generating insights for marketing teams.

title: AI Product Manager
description: Work with cross-functional teams to design AI-driven products, define requirements, and oversee delivery.

title: Computer Vision Engineer
description: Develop computer vision models for object detection, recognition, and video analytics.
